MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA11 postcode area of Bridge of Weir, affecting properties in Ranfurly Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5.09am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the repairs required to a damaged electrical box on Ranfurly Road and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12 noon. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6.46am on the 14th of December 2020.
